description:
Hi, üëã‚ùÑ ü•∂üåå

The sacred image of Podlasie is a multitude of chapels by dirt roads, always at the crossroads. Shrines often have a companion, i.e. a tree. They were the borders of villages, they protected from all evil, defeat, war and epidemics. Power was assigned to each such sacred place, along with the words of the prayer "from air, hunger, fire and war, save us, Lord." In the summer, seeing such places bathed in flowers, we have confirmation of the importance of the shrine. It's freezing today. Winter and crunchy snow. Taking 2 hours of photos, I noticed that the place does not protect against frost -18 ¬∞Cü•∂  . But who would care when looking at the stars in such Podlasie landscape? We have a hypnotic image in such a view of the sacredness and the sky, I perfectly understand why a roadside shrine in the middle of nowhere has so many properties.

02/07/2021
Spieszyn, Podlasie ‚ù§ POLAND 
Canon 6D plus Samyang 14mm 2.4 XP
378 x 20s ISO1600 @ f2.8

title: Startralis
